description: The COVERAGE_MEMBER_LIST table contains information about the members associated with each coverage record. Since one coverage record can have multiple members, each row in the table corresponds to one member and is noted by the coverage ID and the line number.

columns.name: COVERAGE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the coverage record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number used to identify each member of a coverage record.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID assigned to the patient record (EPT .1).

columns.name: MEM_COVERED_YN
columns.description:
The member�s covered status for the coverage, such as Y � the coverage is verified and in effect, or N � the coverage was invalidated manually. Note: 3 � Pending (not verified, but in effect), 4 � In Question (was verified, but recent carrier information omitted this coverage), 5 � Invalid (never verified, not effective).


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Covered


Not Covered


Pending


In Question


Invalid

columns.name: MEM_REL_TO_SUB_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the category identifier of the member's relationship to the subscriber. This column is commonly used to join to ZC_MEM_REL_TO_SUB.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Self


Spouse


Child


Employee


Unknown

columns.name: MEM_REL_TO_GUAR_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category value associated with the relationship of the patient to the guarantor.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: MEM_REL_TO_SUB_C_NAME

columns.name: DEPENDENT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
For members whose relationship to the subscriber is unclear, this column specifies how the member is covered by the subscriber.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Child Dependent


Adult Dependent


Non-Dependent


Unknown, Flag for Follow-Up

columns.name: COURT_DECREE_C_NAME
columns.description:
For members that are children involved in divorce scenarios, if a court has decreed exactly which of the parents is responsible for the child's medical expenses, then this column specifies how this subscriber is involved in that court decree.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Not Applicable (no court decree concerning healthcare expenses)


Subscriber is the parent responsible for healthcare expenses


Subscriber is the spouse of the parent responsible for healthcare expenses


Subscriber is a parent jointly responsible for healthcare expenses


Subscriber is the spouse of a parent jointly responsible for healthcare expenses


Subscriber is the parent not responsible for healthcare expenses


Subscriber is the spouse of the parent not responsible for healthcare expenses

columns.name: CUSTODY_C_NAME
columns.description:
For members that are children involved in divorce scenarios, this column specifies what type of custody the subscriber has over the child member.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Not Applicable (parents married, widowed parent, etc)


Subscriber is the custodial parent


Subscriber is a joint custody parent


Subscriber is the spouse of the custodial parent


Subscriber is the spouse of a joint custody parent


Subscriber is the non-custodial parent


Subscriber is the spouse of the non-custodial parent

columns.name: MEM_PAYOR_NAME
columns.description: Stores the patient name as known to the Payor. This item is used to keep the name that is stored in the Patient master file separate from the name that the Payor is expecting.

columns.name: MEM_VERIFICATION_ID
columns.description: The verification record for the coverage member.

columns.name: MEM_NUMBER
columns.description: The identification number assigned to the member for the coverage.

columns.name: MEM_PERSON_CODE
columns.description: This contains the person code for a member ID on a coverage. For a member ID of 12345-01, the person code would be "01".

columns.name: ELIGIBILITY_CLAR_C_NAME
columns.description:
Clarifies the eligibility of the patient when sending an Rx Adjudication message (i.e. Student). This item is populated in ambulatory pharmacy.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Not Specified


No Override


Override


Full Time Student


Disabled Dependent


Dependent Parent


Significant Other

columns.name: MEM_APP_DATE
columns.description: The date on which the member applied for coverage.

columns.name: MEM_APP_TIME
columns.description: The time on which the member applied for coverage.

columns.name: MEM_EFF_FROM_DATE
columns.description: The date on which the coverage goes into effect for the member.

columns.name: MEM_STUDENT_YN
columns.description: If the member is a full time student this column contains the value �Y�. If the member is not a full time student, as determined by the member�s Employment Status, this column contains the value �N�.

columns.name: MEM_MEDICARE_NUM
columns.description: Stores the patient's Medicare number from the patient record, if applicable. This stored value may be a HICN or a MBI.  This data is used primarily for Registration and will match PATIENT_4.LEGACY_HICN. However, it may be different from MEM_MEDICARE_NUM_COVERAGE, which is maintained through Enrollment and Eligibility infrastructure (preferred for managed care scenarios).

columns.name: MEM_ENROLL_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
The member's reason for enrollment.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: HIX_EN_ADDL_MAINT_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item stores the additional maintenance reason from an incoming ANSI 834 enrollment file.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: MEM_EFF_TO_DATE
columns.description: The date after which the coverage is no longer in effect for the member and the member becomes ineligible for benefits.

columns.name: MEM_TERM_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
The reason the member was terminated from the coverage.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: MEM_SCHED_DISCON_DT
columns.description: The member scheduled discontinuation date.

columns.name: MEM_LATE_ENROLL_YN
columns.description:
Y � the member applied for coverage after open enrollment. N � the member did not apply for the coverage after the open enrollment period.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: MEM_VERIF_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The last saved value of the member's verification status.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: LAST_VERIF_DATE
columns.description: The date the member on the coverage was last verified.

columns.name: PCN_OVERRIDE
columns.description: The processor control number (PCN) for this member. This PCN overrides the PCN at the plan or payor level for this member only.

columns.name: MEMBER_VERF_USER_ID
columns.description: The ID of the user who last verified this member's status.

columns.name: MEMBER_ID_FROM_FILE
columns.description: The member ID received on the source file for the member on the coverage.

columns.name: CARRIER_IDENTIFIER
columns.description: Used for prescription adjudication in ambulatory pharmacy. Carrier code assigned in Workers' Compensation Program (327-CR).

columns.name: CLAIM_IDENTIFIER
columns.description: Used for prescription adjudication in ambulatory pharmacy. Identifies the claim number assigned by Workers' Compensation Program (435-DZ).

columns.name: FACILITY_IDENTIFIER
columns.description: Used for prescription adjudication in ambulatory pharmacy. ID assigned to the patient's clinic/host party (336-8C).

columns.name: HOME_PLAN
columns.description: Used for prescription adjudication in ambulatory pharmacy. Code identifying the Blue Cross or Blue Shield plan ID which indicates where the member's coverage has been designated. Usually where the member lives or purchased their coverage (314-CE).

columns.name: PLAN_IDENTIFIER
columns.description: Used for prescription adjudication in ambulatory pharmacy. Assigned by the processor to identify a set of parameters, benefits, or coverage criteria used to adjudicate a claim (524-FO).

columns.name: RX_BILLING_INFO_ID
columns.description: Contains the default prescription billing information on this coverage like default values to send during claim adjudication.

columns.name: HIX_APP_ID
columns.description: The application ID of exchange coverages.

columns.name: HIX_ORIGIN
columns.description: The origin type of exchange coverages.

columns.name: MEM_MAIL_CITY
columns.description: The member's mailing city.

columns.name: MEM_MAIL_STATE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The member's mailing state.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: MEM_MAIL_ZIP
columns.description: The member's mailing ZIP code.

columns.name: MEM_MAIL_COUNTY_C_NAME
columns.description:
The member's mailing county.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: MEM_MAIL_COUNTRY_C_NAME
columns.description:
The member's mailing country.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: MEM_MAIL_ADDR_LN_1
columns.description: This item contains line one of the member's mailing address (the entirety of which is stored in CVG-18930). The purpose of this item is to provide the ability for reporting administrators to retrieve line one of the address without having to join the member address table.

columns.name: MEM_MAIL_ADDR_LN_2
columns.description: This item contains line two of the member's mailing address (the entirety of which is stored in CVG-18930). The purpose of this item is to provide the ability for reporting administrators to retrieve line two of the address without having to join the member address table.

columns.name: MEM_CUSTO_NAME
columns.description: The name of the member's custodial parent.

columns.name: MEM_CUSTO_CITY
columns.description: The city of the member's custodial parent.

columns.name: MEM_CUSTO_STATE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The state of the member's custodial parent.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: MEM_MAIL_STATE_C_NAME

columns.name: MEM_CUSTO_ZIP
columns.description: The ZIP code of the member's custodial parent.

columns.name: MEM_CUSTO_COUNTY_C_NAME
columns.description:
The county of the member's custodial parent.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: MEM_MAIL_COUNTY_C_NAME

columns.name: MEM_CUSTO_COUNTRY_C_NAME
columns.description:
The country of the member's custodial parent.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: MEM_MAIL_COUNTRY_C_NAME

columns.name: MEM_CUSTO_EMAIL
columns.description: The e-mail address of the member's custodial parent.

columns.name: MEM_CUSTO_ADDR_LN_1
columns.description: This item contains line one of the member's custodial parent address (the entirety of which is stored in CVG-18962). The purpose of this item is to provide the ability for reporting administrators to retrieve line one of the address without having to join the member custodial parent address table.

columns.name: MEM_CUSTO_ADDR_LN_2
columns.description: This item contains line two of the member's custodial parent address (the entirety of which is stored in CVG-18962). The purpose of this item is to provide the ability for reporting administrators to retrieve line two of the address without having to join the member custodial parent address table.

columns.name: MEM_COVERED_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the category identifier of member's covered status, such as whether their coverage is currently valid or in question. This column is commonly used to join to ZC_COVERED_STATUS.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: MEM_COVERED_YN

columns.name: MEM_APPL_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time on which the member applied for coverage.

columns.name: MEM_PAYOR_SEX_C_NAME
columns.description:
The member's sex as it is recorded in the payor's system.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Female


Male


Unknown


Nonbinary


X


Other

columns.name: MEM_MEDICARE_NUM_COVERAGE
columns.description: Stores the member's Medicare number from the coverage, if applicable. This stored value may be a HICN or a MBI.  This data is maintained through the standard Enrollment and Eligibility infrastructure (i.e. should be accurate for managed care scenarios). The number stored on the patient's record (MEM_MEDICARE_NUM or PATIENT.MEDICARE_NUM) may be different since it is used primarily for Registration.

columns.name: MEM_LEGACY_HICN_COVERAGE
columns.description: If there is a HICN available for the member (e.g. known prior to receiving their MBI), this column stores the HICN from the coverage.  This data is maintained through the standard Enrollment and Eligibility infrastructure (i.e. should be accurate for managed care scenarios). The number stored on the patient's record (PATIENT_4.LEGACY_HICN) may be different since it is used primarily for Registration.

columns.name: MEM_MAIL_HOUSE_NUM
columns.description: The house number of the member's mailing address.

columns.name: MEM_MAIL_DISTRICT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The district category ID of the member's mailing address.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: MEM_CUSTO_HOUSE_NUM
columns.description: The house number of the member's custodial parent's address.

columns.name: MEM_CUSTO_DISTRICT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The district category ID of the member's custodial parent's address.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: MEM_MAIL_DISTRICT_C_NAME

columns.name: MEM_ADDR_IS_UNDELIV_YN
columns.description:
Indicates if member mailing address is undeliverable.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: MEM_MEDICAID_NUM
columns.description: The Medicaid Number for a member on a given coverage.

columns.name: MEM_EFF_DT_CHNG_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
The effective date change reason at the member level.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined
